articles.title: Galaxy S26 leak reveals Samsung’s big move into magnetic accessories - Android Authority
articles.description: Samsung’s Galaxy S26 is reportedly set to debut a full lineup of Qi2-ready accessories, ranging from carbon and silicone to clear cases.

articles.title: Reminder: Virtual Boy For Switch And Switch 2 Are Available On The My Nintendo Store - Nintendo Life
Call of Duty won’t release Modern Warfare or Black Ops back to back anymore - The Verge
articles.description: Activision’s future Call of Duty releases will no longer include back-to-back launches of Modern Warfare or Black Ops games.

articles.title: Baldur's Gate 3 dev Larian says "There aren't currently any plans" for a Divinity: Original Sin 3 — but a new Definitive Edition for 2 just got leaked - Windows Central
articles.description: Larian's next game may not be Divinity: Original Sin 3, but a new version of 2 may be on the way.

articles.title: Microsoft Patch Tuesday, December 2025 Edition - Krebs on Security
articles.description: Microsoft today pushed updates to fix at least 56 security flaws in its Windows operating systems and supported software. This final Patch Tuesday of 2025 tackles one zero-day bug that is already being exploited, as well as two publicly disclosed…

articles.title: I wore Google's upcoming Android XR smart glasses, and it's a future I'd actually want to live in - ZDNET
articles.description: From multimodal AI glasses to immersive headsets, Google's Android XR vision is more ambitious - yet clearer - than ever.
